attributes.action: allow us to use vacant land to host a free arts and performance festival
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: artists and performers who currently amalgamate in one place at any said time are being told they are breaching the criminal justice act merely by gathering in a group and expressing themselves through art and music to a free audience, we herefore petition to be granted the use of derelict/ wasteland where everyone is invited without cost to attend, and appreciate the forementioned arts, other countries inside and out of the european union have been granted this right, under the name of a "teknival". These teknivals attract visitors and tourists from all over the world to experience that particular countries culture and artistic preference, and local business' have the oppertunity to showcase and promote their products to a wide audience, creating funding for such an event. the events run for 5 days in total and entry and exit is not restricted, artists should not pay or be paid to perform as it is a free event, funding from business' wishing to promote themselves and gain revenue, will contribute towards funding to fulfill health and safety requirements.
